name: fish_lsp_log_file_path
description: the log file path for the fish-lsp to use (default: '~/path/to/fish-lsp/logs.txt')

name: fish_lsp_workspaces
description: an array of files to include in the fish-lsp scope (default: '/usr/share/fish/', '$HOME/.config/fish')

name: fish_lsp_renamable_workspaces
description: an array of workspaces that fish-lsp allows for renaming within (default: '$HOME/.config/fish')
